lukeskywalker.name: Luke Skywalker
lukeskywalker.description: When defending, you may change 1 of your <i-focus> results to a <i-evade> result.

biggsdarklighter.name: Biggs Darklighter
biggsdarklighter.description: Once per game, at the start of the Combat phase, you may choose that until the end of the round, other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

wedgeantilles.name: Wedge Antilles
wedgeantilles.description: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of "0").

garvendreis.name: Garven Dreis
garvendreis.description: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

hobbieklivian.name: "Hobbie" Klivian
hobbieklivian.description: When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

jekporkins.name: Jek Porkins
jekporkins.description: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die. On a <i-hit> result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to this ship.

tarnmison.name: Tarn Mison
tarnmison.description: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

wesjanson.name: Wes Janson
wesjanson.description: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from the defender

hortonsalm.name: Horton Salm
hortonsalm.description: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.

dutchvander.name: "Dutch" Vander
dutchvander.description: After acquiring a target lock, choose another ship at Range 1-2. The chosen ship may immediately acquire a target lock.

kavil.name: Kavil
kavil.description: When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

drearenthal.name: Drea Renthal
drearenthal.description: After you spend a target lock, you may receive 1 stress token to acquire a target lock.

hansolo.name: Han Solo
hansolo.description: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice. If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

landocalrissian.name: Lando Calrissian
landocalrissian.description: After you execute a green maneuver, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action shown in its action bar.

chewbacca.name: Chewbacca
chewbacca.description: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

hansolo-swx57.name: Han Solo (HotR)
hansolo-swx57.description: When you are placed during setup, you can be placed anywhere in the play area beyond Range 3 of the enemy ships.

rey.name: Rey
rey.description: When attacking or defending, if the enemy ship is inside your firing arc, you may reroll up to 2 of your blank results.

chewbacca-swx57.name: Chewbacca (HotR)
chewbacca-swx57.description: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is destroyed (but has not fled the battlefield), you may perform an attack.

tychocelchu.name: Tycho Celchu
tychocelchu.description: You may perform actions even while you have stress tokens.

arvelcrynyd.name: Arvel Crynyd
arvelcrynyd.description: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.

jakefarrell.name: Jake Farrell
jakefarrell.description: After you perform a focus action or are assigned a focus token, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

gemmersojan.name: Gemmer Sojan
gemmersojan.description: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

janors.name: Jan Ors
janors.description: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

kylekatarn.name: Kyle Katarn
kylekatarn.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

roarkgarnet.name: Roark Garnet
roarkgarnet.description: At the start of the Combat phase, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3. Until the end of the phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "12".

dacebonearm.name: Dace Bonearm
dacebonearm.description: When an enemy ship at Range 1-3 receives at least one ion token, if you are not stressed you may receive 1 stress token to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

palobgodalhi.name: Palob Godalhi
palobgodalhi.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from an enemy ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

torkilmux.name: Torkil Mux
torkilmux.description: At the end of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. Until the end of the Combat phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "0".

tennumb.name: Ten Numb
tennumb.description: When attacking, 1 of your <i-crit> results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

ibtisam.name: Ibtisam
ibtisam.description: When attacking or defending, if you have at least one stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

keyanfarlander.name: Keyan Farlander
keyanfarlander.description: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your <i-focus> results to <i-hit> results.

neradantels.name: Nera Dantels
neradantels.description: You can perform <i-torpedo> secondary weapon attacks against enemy ships outside your firing arc.

airencracken.name: Airen Cracken
airencracken.description: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action.

lieutenantblount.name: Lieutenant Blount
lieutenantblount.description: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

ndrusuhlak.name: N'dru Suhlak
ndrusuhlak.description: While attacking, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

kaatoleeachos.name: Kaat'o Leeachos
kaatoleeachos.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from another friendly ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

corranhorn.name: Corran Horn
corranhorn.description: At the start of the End phase, you may perform one attack. You cannot attack during the next round.

etahnabaht.name: Etahn A'baht
etahnabaht.description: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its <i-hit> results to a <i-crit> result.

cr90corvettefore.name: CR90 Corvette (Fore)
cr90corvettefore.description: When attacking with your primary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to roll 1 additional attack die.

dashrendar.name: Dash Rendar
dashrendar.description: You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.

leebo.name: "Leebo"
leebo.description: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve, and discard the other.

eadenvrill.name: Eaden Vrill
eadenvrill.description: When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

mirandadoni.name: Miranda Doni
mirandadoni.description: Once per round when attacking, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

esegetuketu.name: Esege Tuketu
esegetuketu.description: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, it may treat your focus tokens as its own.

poedameron.name: Poe Dameron
poedameron.description: While attacking or defending, if you have a focus token, you may change 1 of your <i-focus> results to a <i-hit> or <i-evade> result.

blueace.name: "Blue Ace"
blueace.description: When performing a boost action, you may use the [<i-turnleft> 1] or [<i-turnright> 1] template.

elloasty.name: Ello Asty
elloasty.description: While you are not stressed, you may treat your [<i-trollleft>] and [<i-trollright>] maneuvers as white maneuvers.

redace.name: "Red Ace"
redace.description: The first time you remove a shield token from your ship each round, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

poedameron-swx57.name: Poe Dameron (HotR)
poedameron-swx57.description: While attacking or defending, if you have a focus token, you may change 1 of your <i-focus> results to a <i-hit> or <i-evade> result.

niennunb.name: Nien Nunb
niennunb.description: When you recieve a stress token, if there is an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1, you may discard that stress token.

snapwexley.name: "Snap" Wexley
snapwexley.description: After you execute a 2-, 3- or 4-speed maneuver, if you are not touching a ship, you may perform a free boost action

jesspava.name: Jess Pava
jesspava.description: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each other friendly ship at Range 1.

herasyndulla.name: Hera Syndulla
herasyndulla.description: When you reveal a red or green maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.

kananjarrus.name: Kanan Jarrus
kananjarrus.description: When an enemy ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, you may spend a focus token. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.

chopper.name: "Chopper"
chopper.description: At the start of the Combat phase, each enemy ship you are touching receives 1 stress token.

herasyndulla-as.name: Hera Syndulla
herasyndulla-as.description: When you reveal a green or red maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.

sabinewren.name: Sabine Wren
sabinewren.description: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

ezrabridger.name: Ezra Bridger
ezrabridger.description: When defending, if you are stressed, you may change up to 2 of your <i-focus> results to <i-evade> results.

zeborrelios.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
zeborrelios.description: When defending, you may cancel <i-crit> results before <i-hit> results.

norrawexley.name: Norra Wexley
norrawexley.description: When attacking or defending, you may spend a target lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 <i-focus> result to your roll.

sharabey.name: Shara Bey
sharabey.description: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, it may treat your blue target lock tokens as its own.

thanekyrell.name: Thane Kyrell
thanekyrell.description: After an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 attacks another friendly ship, you may perform a free action.

braylenstramm.name: Braylen Stramm
braylenstramm.description: After you execute a maneuver, you may roll an attack die. On a <i-hit> or <i-crit> result, remove 1 stress token from your ship.

maulermithel.name: "Mauler Mithel"
maulermithel.description: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

darkcurse.name: "Dark Curse"
darkcurse.description: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

nightbeast.name: "Night Beast"
nightbeast.description: After executing a green maneuver, you may perform a free focus action.

scourge.name: "Scourge"
scourge.description: When attacking a defender that has 1 or more Damage cards, roll 1 additional attack die.

youngster.name: "Youngster"
youngster.description: Friendly TIE fighters at Range 1-3 may perform the action on your equipped <i-elite> Upgrade card.

wampa.name: "Wampa"
wampa.description: When attacking, at the start of the "Compare Results" step, you may cancel all dice results. If you cancel a <i-crit> result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to the defender.

chaser.name: "Chaser"
chaser.description: When another friendly ship at Range 1 spends a focus token, assign a focus token to your ship.

howlrunner.name: "Howlrunner"
howlrunner.description: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

backstabber.name: "Backstabber"
backstabber.description: When attacking from outside the defender's firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

wingedgundark.name: "Winged Gundark"
wingedgundark.description: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your hit results to a critical result.

ahsokatano.name: Ahsoka Tano
ahsokatano.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1. It may perform 1 free action.

sabinewren-tie.name: Sabine Wren
sabinewren-tie.description: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

captainrex.name: Captain Rex
captainrex.description: After you perform an attack, assign the "Suppressive Fire" Condition card to the defender.

zeborrelios-tie.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
zeborrelios-tie.description: When defending, you may cancel <i-crit> results before <i-hit> results.

darthvader.name: Darth Vader
darthvader.description: During your "Perform Action" step, you may perform 2 actions.

maarekstele.name: Maarek Stele
maarekstele.description: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal and discard the others.

zertikstrom.name: Zertik Strom
zertikstrom.description: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot add their range combat bonus when attacking.

junoeclipse.name: Juno Eclipse
junoeclipse.description: When you reveal your maneuver, you may increase or decrease its speed by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

commanderalozen.name: Commander Alozen
commanderalozen.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1.

lieutenantcolzet.name: Lieutenant Colzet
lieutenantcolzet.description: At the start of the End phase, you may spend a target lock you have on an enemy ship to flip 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to it faceup.

bobafett.name: Boba Fett
bobafett.description: When you reveal a bank maneuver (<i-bankleft> or <i-bankright>), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

bobafett-scum.name: Boba Fett
bobafett-scum.description: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at Range 1.

kathscarlet.name: Kath Scarlet
kathscarlet.description: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 <i-crit> result.

kathscarlet-scum.name: Kath Scarlet
kathscarlet-scum.description: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

krassistrelix.name: Krassis Trelix
krassistrelix.description: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

emonazzameen.name: Emon Azzameen
emonazzameen.description: When dropping a bomb, you may use a [<i-turnleft> 3], [<i-straight> 3], or [<i-turnright> 3] template instead of the [<i-straight> 1] template.

soontirfel.name: Soontir Fel
soontirfel.description: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

turrphennir.name: Turr Phennir
turrphennir.description: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

felswrath.name: "Fel's Wrath"
felswrath.description: When the number of Damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed until the end of the Combat phase.

carnorjax.name: Carnor Jax
carnorjax.description: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.

tetrancowall.name: Tetran Cowall
tetrancowall.description: When you reveal a <i-kturn> maneuver, you may treat the speed of that maneuver as "1," "3," or "5."

kirkanos.name: Kir Kanos
kirkanos.description: When attacking at Range 2 or 3, you may spend 1 evade token to add 1 <i-hit> result to your roll.

lieutenantlorrir.name: Lieutenant Lorrir
lieutenantlorrir.description: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the [<i-bankleft> 1] or [<i-bankright> 1] template instead of the [<i-straight> 1] to roll.

captainkagi.name: Captain Kagi
captainkagi.description: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

coloneljendon.name: Colonel Jendon
coloneljendon.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign one of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

captainyorr.name: Captain Yorr
captainyorr.description: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

majorrhymer.name: Major Rhymer
majorrhymer.description: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

captainjonus.name: Captain Jonus
captainjonus.description: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

tomaxbren.name: Tomax Bren
tomaxbren.description: Once per round, after you discard an <i-elite> Upgrade card, flip that card faceup.

deathfire.name: "Deathfire"
deathfire.description: When you reveal your maneuver dial or after you perform an action, you may perform a <i-bomb> Upgrade card action as a free action.

rexlerbrath.name: Rexler Brath
rexlerbrath.description: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

colonelvessery.name: Colonel Vessery
colonelvessery.description: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

maarekstele-iv.name: Maarek Stele
maarekstele-iv.description: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal and discard the others.

countessryad.name: Countess Ryad
countessryad.description: When you reveal a [<i-straight>] maneuver, you may treat it as a [<i-kturn>] maneuver.

whisper.name: "Whisper"
whisper.description: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

echo.name: "Echo"
echo.description: When you decloak, you must use the [<i-bankleft> 2] or [<i-bankright> 2] template instead of the [<i-straight> 2] template.

rearadmiralchiraneau.name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
rearadmiralchiraneau.description: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change one of your <i-focus> results to a <i-crit> result.

commanderkenkirk.name: Commander Kenkirk
commanderkenkirk.description: If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.

captainoicunn.name: Captain Oicunn
captainoicunn.description: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 damage.

raiderclasscorvettefore.name: Raider-class Corvette (Fore)
raiderclasscorvettefore.description: Once per round, after you perform a primary weapon attack, you may spend 2 energy to perform another primary weapon attack.

redline.name: "Redline"
redline.description: You may maintain 2 target locks on the same ship. When you acquire a target lock, you may acquire a second lock on that same ship.

deathrain.name: "Deathrain"
deathrain.description: When dropping a bomb, you may use the front guides of your ship. After dropping a bomb, you may perform a free barrel roll action.

gozanticlasscruiser.name: Gozanti-Class Cruiser
gozanticlasscruiser.description: After you execute a maneuver, you may deploy up to 2 docked ships.

omegaace.name: "Omega Ace"
omegaace.description: When attacking, you may spend a focus token and a target lock you have on the defender to change all of your results to <i-crit> results.

epsilonleader.name: "Epsilon Leader"
epsilonleader.description: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from each friendly ship at Range 1.

zetaace.name: "Zeta Ace"
zetaace.description: When performing a barrel roll, you may use the [<i-straight> 2] template (instead of the [<i-straight> 1] template).

omegaleader.name: "Omega Leader"
omegaleader.description: Enemy ships that you have locked cannot modify any dice when attacking you or defending against your attacks.

zetaleader.name: "Zeta Leader"
zetaleader.description: When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.

epsilonace.name: "Epsilon Ace"
epsilonace.description: While you do not have any Damage cards, treat your pilot skill value as "12."

theinquisitor.name: The Inquisitor
theinquisitor.description: When attacking with your primary weapon at Range 2-3, treat the range of the attack as Range 1.

valenrudor.name: Valen Rudor
valenrudor.description: After defending, you may perform a free action.

quickdraw.name: "Quickdraw"
quickdraw.description: Once per round, when you lose a shield token, you may perform a primary weapon attack.

backdraft.name: "Backdraft"
backdraft.description: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, you may add 1 <i-crit> result.

princexizor.name: Prince Xizor
princexizor.description: When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncancelled <i-hit> or <i-crit> result instead of you.

guri.name: Guri
guri.description: At the start of the Combat phase, if you are at Range 1 of an enemy ship, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

serissu.name: Serissu
serissu.description: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, it may reroll 1 defense die.

laetinashera.name: Laetin A'Shera
laetinashera.description: After you defend against an attack, if the attack did not hit, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

genesisred.name: Genesis Red
genesisred.description: After you aquire a target lock, assign focus and evade tokens to your ship until you have the same number of each token as the locked ship.

quinnjast.name: Quinn Jast
quinnjast.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may receive a weapons disabled token to flip one of your discarded <i-torpedo> or <i-missile> Upgrade cards faceup.

inaldra.name: Inaldra
inaldra.description: When attacking or defending, you may spend 1 shield to reroll any number of your dice.

sunnybounder.name: Sunny Bounder
sunnybounder.description: Once per round, after you roll or reroll dice, if you have the same result on each of your dice, you may add 1 matching result.

ig88a.name: IG-88A
ig88a.description: After you perform an attack that destroys the defender, you may recover 1 shield.

ig88b.name: IG-88B
ig88b.description: Once per round, after you perform an attack that does not hit, you may perform an attack with an equipped <i-cannon> secondary weapon.

ig88c.name: IG-88C
ig88c.description: After you perform a boost action, you may perform a free evade action.

ig88d.name: IG-88D
ig88d.description: You may execute the [<i-sloopleft> 3] or [<i-sloopright> 3] maneuver using the corresponding [<i-turnleft> 3] or [<i-turnright> 3] template.

bossk.name: Bossk
bossk.description: When you perform an attack that hits, before dealing damage, you may cancel 1 of your <i-crit> results to add 2 <i-hit> results.

lattsrazzi.name: Latts Razzi
lattsrazzi.description: When a friendly ship declares an attack, you may spend a target lock you have on the defender to reduce its agility by 1 for that attack.

moraloeval.name: Moralo Eval
moraloeval.description: You can perform <i-cannon> secondary weapon attacks against ships inside your auxiliary firing arc.

talonbanecobra.name: Talonbane Cobra
talonbanecobra.description: When attacking or defending, double the effect of your range combat bonuses.

grazthehunter.name: Graz The Hunter
grazthehunter.description: When defending, if the attacker is inside your firing arc, roll 1 additional defense die.

zuckuss.name: Zuckuss
zuckuss.description: When attacking, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, then the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

4lom.name: 4-LOM
4lom.description: At the start of the End phase, you may assign 1 of your stress tokens to another ship at Range 1.

dengar.name: Dengar
dengar.description: Once per round after defending, if the attacker is inside your firing arc, you may perform an attack against that ship.

teltrevura.name: Tel Trevura
teltrevura.description: The first time you would be destroyed, instead cancel any remaining damage, discard all Damage cards, and deal 4 facedown Damage cards to this ship.

manaroo.name: Manaroo
manaroo.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign all focus, evade, and target lock tokens assigned to you to another friendly ship at Range 1.

fennrau.name: Fenn Rau
fennrau.description: When attacking or defending, if the enemy ship is at Range 1, you may roll 1 additional die.

oldteroch.name: Old Teroch
oldteroch.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1. If you are inside its firing arc, it discards all focus and evade tokens.

kadsolus.name: Kad Solus
kadsolus.description: After you execute a red maneuver, assign 2 focus tokens to your ship.

ketsuonyo.name: Ketsu Onyo
ketsuonyo.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose a ship at Range 1. If it is inside your primary and mobile firing arcs, assign 1 tractor beam token to it.

asajjventress.name: Asajj Ventress
asajjventress.description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose a ship at Range 1-2. If it is inside your mobile firing arc, assign 1 stress token to it.

sabinewren-lcpc.name: Sabine Wren
sabinewren-lcpc.description: When defending against an enemy ship inside your mobile firing arc at Range 1-2, you may add 1 <i-focus> result to your roll.
